channel.title: Comments on: A Weekend in SoCal

item.title: By: Eric
item.dc:creator: Eric
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://grandmighty.github.io/grandmighty/2016/08/a-weekend-in-socal/#comment-398036">Albert</a>.
The Borbets and small ass tires are currently sitting in a pile in the side yard, where they belong. Away from the car.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Albert.

The Borbets and small ass tires are currently sitting in a pile in the side yard, where they belong. Away from the car.

item.title: By: Albert
item.dc:creator: Albert
item.description: Sounds like a chill weekend. Glad the car got back safe...god those borbets are hideous... and those tires on them... i'll stop there.
item.content:encoded: Sounds like a chill weekend. Glad the car got back safe…god those borbets are hideous… and those tires on them… i’ll stop there.
